Description: Secure, production-ready AWS infrastructure for financial services application with comprehensive security controls

EnvironmentSuffix.Description: Environment suffix for all resources and domain

TrustedIPRange.Description: CIDR block for trusted IP range allowed for SSH access

NotificationEmail.Description: Email address for CloudWatch alarm notifications

DBEngineVersion.Description: Database engine version for non-Aurora MySQL. Use a supported RDS MySQL version like 8.0.39.

ResourceSuffix.Description: Optional suffix to append to resource names for uniqueness. Used for S3 buckets to avoid naming conflicts.

Properties.Description: KMS key for encrypting EBS volumes and S3 buckets

Statement.Sid: Allow services to use the key
Allow CloudWatch Logs for VPC Flow Logs

Properties.GroupDescription: Security group for bastion host with restricted SSH access
Security group for Application Load Balancer

Properties.AlarmDescription: Alert when root account is used
Alert on S3 bucket policy changes

AlarmTopicArn.Description: SNS Topic ARN for CloudWatch Alarms
